thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com
thread.title: Finlay Lawrence

author: Finlay Lawrence
title: Finlay Lawrence
text:
I had a customer bought something electrical... they had removed all warranty stickers leaving VOID all over the item, yet PayPal decided to refund them. They could have just swapped the internal parts for a faulty one and got them selves a free working replacement for their faulty item and put me Â£70 down the drain.
What is the point in me protecting myself with warranty stickers if PayPal are just going to ignore people that remove them?
SHOCKING.
I guess if you just complain about anything you get your money back, so if you can't beat them, join them!
